extends MIDIObject

RestartMIDISystem

public static void RestartMIDISystem()
                              throws CAException
This is useful for forcing the system to have drivers rescan hardware, especially in the case of serial MIDI interfaces.

New for CoreMIDI 1.1.

CoreAudio::MIDIRestart()

Throws:
CAException

createExternalDevice

public static MIDIDevice createExternalDevice(CAFString name,
                                              CAFString manufacturer,
                                              CAFString model)
                                       throws CAException
The new device is not added to the current MIDISetupRef to do this, use MIDISetupAddExternalDevice. Useful for a studio configuration editor.

New for CoreMIDI 1.1.



CoreAudio::MIDIExternalDeviceCreate()

Parameters:
name - The name of the new device.
manufacturer - The name of the device's manufacturer.
model - The device's model name.
Returns:
On successful return, points to the newly-created device.
Throws:
CAException

removeDevice

public static void removeDevice(MIDIDevice device)
                         throws CAException
Generally this should only be called from a studio configuration editor, to remove a device which is offline and which the user has specified as being permanently missing. Instead of removing devices from the setup, drivers should set the device's kMIDIPropertyOffline to 1 so that if the device reappears later, none of its properties are lost.

New for CoreMIDI 1.1.



CoreAudio::MIDISetupRemoveDevice()

Parameters:
device - The device to be removed.
Throws:
CAException
